content: Please specify the object attribute that corresponds to the group name.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip that informs users about the required attribute for LDAP group name input. It appears as a tooltip when the "LDAP Group Name Attribute" field has an error and needs user attention. Translators should provide a clear explanation of this concept in their native language to assist users with LDAP configuration.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "الرجاء تحديد ميزة الهدف التي تتوافق مع اسم المجموعة." is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Please specify the object attribute that corresponds to the group name.' While technically correct, 'ميزة الهدف' (objective feature) is a somewhat awkward phrasing. A more natural translation would focus on 'attribute' directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: الرجاء تحديد سمة الكائن التي تتوافق مع اسم المجموعة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'joska' is a rare and somewhat archaic form. 'Joka' is the more common and preferred form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ole hyvä ja määrittele objektiattribuutti, joka vastaa ryhmän nimeä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ti preghiamo di specificare" is a somewhat formal way of saying 'Please specify'. While not incorrect, a more natural and common phrasing in modern Italian would be 'Specifica' or 'Per favore, specifica'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Specifica l'attributo dell'oggetto che corrisponde al nome del gruppo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Indicați atributul obiectului de grup care corespunde numelui de grup.' is a bit literal and could be more natural in Romanian. It translates to 'Indicate the group object attribute that corresponds to the group name.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vă rugăm să specificați atributul obiectului care corespunde numelui grupului.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit awkward. 'කරුණාකරලා' (karunaakaralaa) is overly emphatic and not typically used in this context. The sentence reads as slightly unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කරුණාවන්තව, සමූහයේ නාමයට අනුරූප වස්තුවෙහි ගුණාංගය දක්වන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ගුණාංගය' (gunanganaya) can be replaced with a more common and natural term in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කරුණාවන්තව, සමූහයේ නාමයට අනුරූප වස්තුවෙහි ලක්ෂණය දක්වන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'одговара' could be improved. While technically correct, 'пресликава' or 'одговара' (a slightly different usage) might be a better fit in this context, emphasizing the mapping or correspondence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо наведите атрибут објекта који пресликава име групе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'відповідає' is technically correct, but a more natural and slightly more accurate translation in this context might use 'що відповідає' to clarify that the attribute *corresponds* to the group name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вкажіть атрибут об'єкта, що відповідає імені групи.
